purpose: The email announces the Call for Papers for the ACM/IEEE International Symposium on Code Generation and Optimization (CGO 2026), which will be held in Sydney, Australia. It provides details about the submission deadlines, including the paper submission date, author rebuttal period, and notification date. The email encourages researchers and practitioners in the field of optimization and code generation to submit their work for consideration.

infos:
Subject: CGO'26 - Call for Papers and first submission round
From: SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Reply-To:SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Date:Wed, 21 May 2025 23:25:17 -0000
Content-Type:text/plain
ACM/IEEE International Symposium on Code Generation and Optimization (CGO 2026)

The Call for Papers<https://2026.cgo.org/track/cgo-2026-papers> is out for the next International Symposium on Code Generation and Optimization (CGO’26)<https://2026.cgo.org/>, taking place next year in Sydney, Australia.
For more information, please visit the CGO’26 website<https://2026.cgo.org/>.

conf_name_candidates.evidence: ACM/IEEE International Symposium on Code Generation and Optimization (CGO 2026)

conf_name_candidates.evidence: next International Symposium on Code Generation and Optimization (CGO’26)
